Com_Welcome:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>Welcome! You've found your way to
<clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>.
Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat_01>There are these famous hot springs near
Goron City to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>. I'd love to hang a
painting of them on the wall here.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>In fact, I understand Gorons love to spend
their time relaxing in the hot water there.

So what I'd really like to do is paint
a <clr:0000>picture of a Goron soaking in the
hot springs<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Ah, but I can't just up and leave this
place. And if I can't look at the scenery
for inspiration...how can I paint it?
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Thanks to you, Link, I've got a painting
on the wall and a stable with a bit more
personality.
Those hot springs look so soothing,
I swear I feel the stress float away
every time I glance at that picture.
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>What?!<sp:5:0:0> You have a <clr:0000>picture of a
Goron soaking in hot springs<clr:ffff>?
DoNotWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Sir! Sir! That bit of decoration is a
beloved fixture here at the stable.
You must not remove it!
It was made in a place far to the south of
here called <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

It's said that the shape of the <clr:0000>ring garland<clr:ffff>
brings good luck. We have it on display
because it's our lucky charm.
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:QuestionAngry_01>Look here, if you're so interested in that,
how about you go get one for yourself.

You'll find they sell them in a place called
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>far off to the south.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>If only I had a picture like that in front of
me.<sp:5:0:0> I could paint a copy of it, easy as
can be.
DoNotWakka_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Sir! Please! I'm telling you that's the
stable's good-luck charm! You simply
can't take it!
If you find it so desirable, go get
one yourself!

They sell them far off to the south in a
place called <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Understand_00>If you happen to have a <clr:0000>picture of a
Goron soaking in hot springs <clr:ffff>I do hope
you'll show it to me.
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Now, this is certainly a feast for the eyes.


But if you ever want to see a different
<clr:0000>painting of a Goron soaking in the hot
springs<clr:ffff> on the wall, just let me know.
Just show me the picture you have in
mind. I'll paint a copy and put it on
display for all to see.
WakkaCharm: We have one of those too!
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat_00>I have to say,<sp:5:0:0> that hot spring looks like it
feels wonderful. Makes me think I should
ditch my post and go for a soak!
Heh, who am I kidding.<sp:5:0:0> It's back to work
for me.
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>We are the closest stable to <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>,
home to the Gorons, of course.

Death Mountain is done erupting, and the
city and roads are in good condition.

Though, you'll still find hot lava <clr:0000>inside the
caves<clr:ffff>, so take care not to get <clr:0000>burned<clr:ffff>.
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>What I'd like to do is hang up a <clr:0000>painting
of a Goron soaking in hot springs<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It would be good advertising for the
hot springs, and would go perfectly on
the walls here since we're so close.
Goodbye_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>Link, did you already pay the <clr:0000>hot spring<clr:ffff>
a visit? Just a dip and your fatigue
will melt away, I swear.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Once upon a time, a hot spring sprang
from the <clr:0000>well <clr:ffff>here too.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>Ahhh, what a splendid painting. Just
looking at it makes me feel like I'm the
one relaxing in a hot spring.
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> would you like to do something
with the <clr:0000>painting of the soaking Goron<clr:ffff>?
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now then, since this is your first time with
us at Woodland Stable...
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Since this is your first time visiting 
Woodland Stable, and I see you've
also <clr:0000>registered a horse <clr:ffff>here...
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>It's a big picture frame, eh?<sp:5:1:0> Now all
I need is the perfect painting to put
inside it.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>There are these famous hot springs near
Goron City <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> of here. <sp:5:0:0>So maybe a
painting of the springs would be nice?
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But I don't know...<sp:5:0:0>a picture of hot water?<sp:5:0:0>
That wouldn't be very interesting to look
at, would it?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>What I'd really like to do is hang a<clr:0000> picture
of a Goron soaking in hot springs<clr:ffff>. Now
THAT would be compelling.<clr:0000>
<sp:3:0:2:0301><clr:ffff>But when will I have time to head over
there and then paint up a picture? Never!
That's when. 
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_01>What I need is a picture of some sortâ€”one
that captures the scenery. <sp:5:1:0>I could use it
for reference and paint up a copy, easy.
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Since this your first time visiting
Woodland Stable, and you also had
yourself a good <clr:0000>sleep<clr:ffff> here...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Pardon?!<sp:5:0:0> You...have a <clr:0000>picture of a
Goron soaking in hot springs<clr:ffff>?
